statements: DELETE FROM RoboAdvisorFeedback WHERE user_id = 123 AND performance_rating > 4.5;
DELETE FROM RoboAdvisorFeedback WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%improve%'
DELETE FROM user_feedback WHERE user_id = 1 AND feedback_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM performance_metrics WHERE metric_id > 100 AND metric_value < 50.00;
DELETE FROM performance_metrics WHERE assets_under_management > 1000000 AND recommendations_met < 70;
DELETE FROM recommendations WHERE user_id = 15 AND recommendation_id = 1;
